# Working with Data

## Import Data

**Manually**
```{r}
data NAME;
input VARNAMES ($);
datalines;
NUMBERS;
run;
```

**CSV Files**
```{r}
data filename;
infile “FILEPATH” dlm = ‘,’ startobs = 2 dsd;
input VARNAMES @@;
run;
```

```{r}
proc import datafile = “FILEPATH” out = NAME dbms = csv replace;
getnames = yes;
datarow = 2;
guessingrows = 1000;
run;
```

**From Existing Table**
```{r}
data NAME;
set DAT;
```

## Export Data

**To CSV**
```{r}
proc export data = NAME outfile = "" outtable = TABNAME dbms = csv replace;
run;
```

**Print Data**
```{r}
proc print data = DAT noobs;
```

## Other 
```{r}
title "";
# in other functions
output out = ;
libname LIBNAME FILEPATH
```
